item.title: Setting up Cloudflared with Termux
item.description: After recently upgrading my daily mobile device, I was left with an unlocked SIM-less Samsung Galaxy S7. After extensive research, it appears the model that I own is bootloader-locked, which prevents me from installing any alternative operating systems such as LineageOS. pkg update update repos pkg install openssh to install openssh sshd to start the ssh daemon, listening for connections on port 8022 passwd on termux to set a password https://wiki.
